case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: Human skeletal remains found in the desert near the town of Vaya Chin on the Tohono O'Odham Reservation.  DNA profile has been matched in CODIS to a man who in 2009 provided a DNA sample to the Maricopa County (Arizona) Sheriff's Office and said his name was Juan Carlos Garcia and that he was a Mexican national.  LE investigations reveal that decedent may have also used the name Alfonso Santos Ventura.  BTB
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: A black long-sleeved uncollared shirt; A pair of brief-style underpants
case_footwear: A pair of black shoes with gray laces, brand "Rockport"
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
